Name: Loong Buns
Desc: Increases all team members' DEF by 25%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
Bg: This round bun featuring Loong horns comes in a variety of flavors. Highly cherished by the people of Huanglong, they are a staple on festive tables. Legend has it that consuming a whole bun brings good fortune in the following year.
